short_summary: VALVES, NONPOWERED 6 EA EACH TO BE DELIVERED TO CFB ESQUIMALT AND CFB HALIFAX
description: The contracting authority wants to buy the following goods:  VALVE, GATE. The contract will be awarded in the next 6 months. The successful bidder will deliver 6 units each to CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.
full_summary:
### Tenders for Gate Valves and Vanne Controlled Valves

**Solicitation No.:** W8482-231021/A
**Bid Submission Deadline:** 2023-01-09T14:00:00
**Publication Date:** 2022-11-17

The Department of National Defence invites bids for the procurement of 12 Gate Valves and vanne controlled valves. The successful bidder will supply the products specified below.

**Product Details:**

| Item No. | Product Description | Quantity | Location |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Gate Valve, Valve, Gate | 6 units | CFB Esquimalt |
| 2 | Gate Valve, Valve, Gate | 6 units | CFB Halifax |

**Specifications:**
Bidders must:
- Identify brand name and model for equivalent or substitute products.
- Submit prices in Canadian dollars.
- Ensure documents are submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Attachements:**
Two attachments are available for download:
- [Updated Solicitation Documentation (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/16/7b9efebadc511c57ed171edbc49e369b/rfp_amendment_w8482-231021-a-en.pdf)
- [Original Solicitation Documentation (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/17/d5d1fae4c885e011f26d0726e9863c45/rfp_w8482-231021-a-en.pdf)

**Eligibility:**
This solicitation is open to suppliers who can demonstrate the ability to supply the required products.

**Language of Conduct:**
All correspondence, documentation and bid submission shall be in either English or French.

**Identification of Trade Agreements:**
The Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) is the relevant trade agreement for this solicitation.

**Methods of Tendering:**
Only competitive tendering will be used for this solicitation.

**Closing Date and Time:**
The bid submission deadline is 2023-01-09T14:00:00. Suppliers are responsible for ensuring their bids are submitted accordingly.

**Contact Information:**
Jean-Pierre Normandin, 819-939-3674, jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca

Please direct all queries to the contact person for this solicitation. [Download attachments](
